## Import File From GitHub

### Call Libraries 
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
url <- 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/angelacalicchio/tidyverse/main/hotels.csv'
hotels <- read_csv(url)
names(hotels)
```

### Summary of Variables 
```{r}
glimpse(hotels)
```

## Select Commands

```{r}
select(hotels, lead_time)
```
